channel.title: Policy on Code Before Breach
channel.description: Recent content in Policy on Code Before Breach

item.title: Is Your Data in the Cat's Paws?
item.description: The 2025 KakaoPay case exposed the limits of formal consent and self-regulation. Data democracy must be achieved through AI-based DPIA verification and civic oversight.

item.title: Thereâ€™s No Such Thing as a Free Lunch, But Security Was Free
item.description: The global security community has depended on CVE for decades without ever paying a dime. As the system nears collapse, it’s time to ask who should bear the cost of public cybersecurity infrastructure.
